about_the_game:
A heroic adventure in the land of Celedain

Embark on a new journey to Celedain where you join a guild, build friendships, and have good times with the people you care about.

Stunning visuals and a wonderful art style

The cities, the landscapes, the characters... all of it looks so wonderful once you see it
on your screen.

Uplifting music and songs for you to enjoy

The graceful music and uplifting songs will bring you a
relaxing ambience as you play the game. Sing along with the songs and replay the videos as much as you like!

Many Gallery Pictures To Collect

Collect biographies, pictures, and scenes with all of your favorite characters!
Learn more about the characters and enjoy the memories you shared in the story!

Save often so you can return to your favorite chapters

There are over 100 Save Slots for you to use. It's a good idea to save at the beginning of each chapter and song. That way, you can always
come back to your favorite scenes and songs!

Steam Achievements for you to collect

Play through the game and get Steam Achievements! There's 10 to collect in all!

Additional Notes


This game is family friendly and has no adult content.

This game is meant to be played as if you were watching an anime or
reading a manga.

As the writers of the story, we wish to bring these heart-warming memories to you
so that you can enjoy them as well.

This game will give you the most impact if you read it from start to finish.

Thank you!

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Are you ready for an epic, yet adorable, adventure?! Join the guild waiting for you in the land of Celedain. This is a story about teamwork, friendship, and good times along the way. The bards will be sure to sing soon of your heroism in Spirit and Katana!
